mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games (aPlayer1, aPlayer2, bPlayer1, bPlayer2, aScore, bScore, dateOfGame) VALUES (#{aPlayer1}, #{aPlayer2}, #{bPlayer1}, #{bPlayer2}, #{aScore}, #{bScore}, #{dateOfGame})
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET aPlayer1 = #{aPlayer1}, aPlayer2 = #{aPlayer2}, bPlayer1 = #{bPlayer1}, bPlayer2 = #{bPlayer2}, aScore = #{aScore}, bScore = #{bScore}, dateOfGame = #{dateOfGame} WHERE ID = #{id}
